org.barghos.core.color.api

Interface IHDRColor4W

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IColor4W, ITup4f, ITup4fR, ITup4R, ITupf, ITupfR, ITupR, Tup, Tup4
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HDRColor4

    public interface IHDRColor4W
extends IColor4W
    This interface allows for selective writing of only HDR-RGBA-Colors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHDRColor4W set(double scalar)
      Sets the rgba components to scalar.
      IHDRColor4W set(double r, double g, double b, double a)
      Sets the rgba components to r, g, b and a.
      IHDRColor4W set(int scalar)
      Sets the rgba components to scalar.
      IHDRColor4W set(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Sets the rgba components to r, g, b and a.
      IHDRColor4W set(ITup4R t)
      Sets the rgba components to the values of t.
      IHDRColor4W setA(int a)
      Set the alpha component to a.
      IHDRColor4W setB(int b)
      Set the blue component to b.
      IHDRColor4W setG(int g)
      Set the green component to g.

      Set the red component to r.

      Set the alpha component to a.

      Set the blue component to b.

      Set the green component to g.

      Set the red component to r.

      Set the alpha component to w.

      Set the red component to x.

    • Method Detail

      • setX

        default IHDRColor4W setX(double x)
        Set the red component to x. x is interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Specified by:
        setX in interface IColor4W
        Specified by:
        setX in interface ITup4f
        Specified by:
        setX in interface Tup4
        Parameters:
        x - The red component.
        Returns:
        The current color or its abstraction.

      • set

        IHDRColor4W set(ITup4R t)
        Sets the rgba components to the values of t. the values of t are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Specified by:
        set in interface IColor4W
        Specified by:
        set in interface ITup4f
        Specified by:
        set in interface Tup4
        Parameters:
        t - A tuple that contains the rgba values in unitspace.
        Returns:
        The current color or its abstraction.

      • set

        IHDRColor4W set(double scalar)
        Sets the rgba components to scalar. scalar is interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Specified by:
        set in interface IColor4W
        Specified by:
        set in interface ITup4f
        Specified by:
        set in interface Tup4
        Parameters:
        scalar - A scalar in unitspace.
        Returns:
        The current color or its abstraction.

      • set

        IHDRColor4W set(int scalar)
        Sets the rgba components to scalar. scalar is interpreted as in colorrange (0 - 255) but can exceed these limits.
        Specified by:
        set in interface IColor4W
        Parameters:
        scalar - A scalar in colorrange.
        Returns:
        The current color or its abstraction.

      • set

        IHDRColor4W set(double r,
                double g,
                double b,
                double a)
        Sets the rgba components to r, g, b and a. r, g, b and a are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
